CustomField.description:
Status used to indicate the status of an associated Harmonic Company Profile record related to the given Account record.
Matched: Account record is successfully matched to a Harmonic Company Profile record. Needs Review: Account data issue has been submitted and needs review from the Rev Ops team. Reviewed: Rev Ops team has confirmed the data issue and is working on correcting. Reported: Rev Ops team has submitted a correction request to the Harmonic team. Unmatched: Account is unmatched from a Harmonic Company Profile record and needs to be resynced. Not Found: No Harmonic Company Profile record is a suitable match for the Account record.
External Systems Utilization: Retool
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Status used to indicate the status of an associated Harmonic Company Profile record related to the given Account record.
CustomField.label: Harmonic Match Status
